item.title: ‘Power: Origins’ Casts Spence Moore and Charlie Mann as Ghost and Tommy in Starz Prequel
item.description: “Power: Origins” has found its Ghost and Tommy. Spence Moore and Charlie Mann will play the respective characters in the Starz prequel series, embodying the younger versions of the charact
